member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetContainerFormat

summary.para: Retrieves the container format of the decoder.

param.name: pguidContainerFormat
param.para: The container format of the decoder. The native container format GUIDs are listed in WIC GUIDs and CLSIDs.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.seealso: How to Write a WIC-Enabled CODEC
Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetCount

summary.para: Retrieves the number of top level metadata blocks.

param.name: pcCount
param.para: When this method returns, contains the number of top level metadata blocks.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.seealso: How to Write a WIC-Enabled CODEC
Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetEnumerator

summary.para: Retrieves an enumeration of objects representing each of the top level metadata blocks.

param.name: ppIEnumMetadata
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to an enumeration of objects.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.seealso: How to Write a WIC-Enabled CODEC
Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetReaderByIndex

summary.para: Retrieves an for a specified top level metadata block.

param.name: nIndex
param.para: The index of the desired top level metadata block to retrieve.

param.name: ppIMetadataReader
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the specified by nIndex.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.seealso: How to Write a WIC-Enabled CODEC
Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide access to all of the codec's top level metadata blocks.

remarks.para: IWICMetadataBlockReader and operate at the root level only; that is, they provide read and write access, respectively, to the top level metadata blocks. They are implemented by and , respectively. To handle any metadata blocks that are not at the top level of the hierarchy, use or .

Note The codec's decoder and encoder implement this interface to expose the enumeration of all top level metadata blocks. While the codec parses the image stream, it calls services like to instantiate metadata readers for any block that is recognized as being able to be embedded in the decoder's container format. The collection of metadata readers is exposed through this interface. For more info, see How to Write a WIC-Enabled CODEC.

member.seealso: Overview of Reading and Writing Image Metadata
